title: Among Seniors, a Declining Interest in Boosters
description: Americans over 65 remain the demographic most likely to have received the original series of vaccinations. But fewer are getting the follow-up shots, surveys indicate.
dc:creator: Paula Span
category: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
media:credit: Christopher Occhicone for The New York Times
media:description: Saul Pashkoff rolled up his sleeve before receiving his second dose of the Covid-19 vaccine at a senior-care facility on Staten Island.
